p: Eucalyptus citriodora (Hook.) or Corymbia citriodora (Hook.) K.D.Hill & L.A.S. Johnson is widely used in perfumery, cosmetics, and room fresheners. For example, extracts of dried leaves resulted by hot water are traditionally used for many purposes like antipyretic remedies, anti-inflammatory, and analgesic as well as for the symptoms of respiratory infections, such as cold, and flu [ 20, 21].
